title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Practical Skill Development Course Based on Pure-Tone Audiometry Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners perform pure-tone audiometry procedures with 90% accuracy in a mannequin simulation environment.
Learners interpret virtual test results within a 5dB margin of error.
Learners apply clinical examination techniques from simulation training to real-world clinical settings.
